img_above_text:
![Wukong Bitter 64.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5f/Wukong_Bitter_64.jpg)
Look for a path to the right of the pavilion and start heading up the winding stairs that criss-cross along the cliffs filled with statues.
img_below_text:
Be on the lookout for various green Wisps to absorb as you ascend, and once you make a hard left to a flat area with a giant red-robed statue nearby, keep an eye out on the right for a **Treasure Chest** full of materials hiding in an alcove.
![Wukong Bitter 66.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5a/Wukong_Bitter_66.jpg)

Look for a path to the right of the pavilion and start heading up the winding stairs that criss-cross along the cliffs filled with statues."
            - Following Text: "Be on the lookout for various green Wisps to absorb as you ascend, and once you make a hard left to a flat area with a giant red-robed statue nearby, keep an eye out on the right for a **Treasure Chest** full of materials hiding in an alcove.
![Wukong Bitter 66.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5a/Wukong_Bitter_66.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts the protagonist, Wukong, navigating a snowy cliffside area filled with ancient statues and structures. A red circle highlights a hidden alcove on the right, suggesting the presence of a **Treasure Chest** containing valuable materials. This scene occurs as part of the ascent along winding stairs, where players are encouraged to explore for collectibles like green Wisps and hidden treasures.
